import { Comment as CommentDiv, CommentInfo, CommentorImgDiv, CommentorName, CommentorDate, CommentContent, CommentButtons } from './CommentElement.js' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import firebase from '../../utils/firebase.js' import "firebase/compat/firestore" const Comment = ({ currentComment }) => { const [comment, setComment] = useState() useEffect(() => { setComment(currentComment) },[]) return ( {comment.author?.displayName} {comment.createdAt?.toDate().toLocaleString()} {comment.content}
